12704.quoteText:
These practices may be changed, but
any changes will be posted and changes will only apply to
activities and information on a going forward, not retroactive
basis.
12704.title: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance

tosdr.case: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance

12705.quoteText: When you use our website, we share information that we may collect from you,
12705.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

tosdr.case: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "When you use our website, we share information that we may collect from you, such as your email (in hashed form), IP address or information about your browser or operating system, with our partner/service provider,[...]"

12708.quoteText:
LiveRamp may use our first party cookie on your browser to match your
shared information to their marketing databases in order to provide back a pseudonymous
privacy-centric identifier for our use in real time bidding in digital advertising.
12708.title: Your profile is combined across various products

tosdr.case: Your profile is combined across various products

12709.quoteText:
These third
parties may in turn link further demographic or interest-based information to your
browser.
12709.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "LiveRamp may use our first party cookie on your browser to match your shared information to their marketing databases in order to provide back a pseudonymous privacy-centric identifier for our use in real time bidding in digital advertising. These third parties may in turn link further demographic or interest-based information to your browser."

or information about your browser or operating
system, with our partner/service provider, LiveRamp Inc and its group companies
('LiveRamp').
12710.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties are involved in operating the service

12711.quoteText:
Note : the privacy practices set forth in
this privacy policy are for this wiki
only.
If you link to other wikis, please review the privacy
policies posted at those wikis.
12711.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

12712.quoteText: To opt out of this use, please click here (LiveRamp).
12712.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising

12713.quoteText: The wiki uses cookie and tracking technology.
12713.title: This service requires first-party cookies

12714.quoteText:
Aggregate
cookie and tracking information may be shared with third parties.
12714.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

12715.quoteText:
What is the DoubleClick DART cookie?

The DoubleClick DART cookie is used by Google in the ads served on the websites of its partners, such as websites displaying AdSense ads or participating in Google certified ad networks.
12715.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

12716.quoteText:
We may share information with governmental agencies or other
companies assisting us in fraud prevention or investigation.
We may do so when: (1) permitted or required by law.
or, (2)
trying to protect against or prevent actual or potential fraud
or unauthorized transactions.
or, (3) investigating fraud
which has already taken place.
12716.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

12717.quoteText:
All emails and newsletters from this wiki
allow you to opt out of further mailings.
12717.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

12718.quoteText:
If you have any questions, concerns, or comments about our privacy policy you may contact us using the information below:
By e-mail: privacy@tvtropes.org
